short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension hides tweets from verified users on Twitter.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension hides tweets from verified users on Twitter.
You can unblur tweets on click or add the user to the whitelist to let them unblurred
